meanings.definition: A substance used for sticking objects together.
meanings.sent1: The adhesives on the tape helped me stick the pieces together.
meanings.sent2: I bought some strong adhesives to repair the broken vase.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat got stuck to the floor after playing with the adhesives.
meanings.sent4: Their friendship was like adhesives, keeping them close through thick and thin.
meanings.sent5: The adhesives worked like magic, making the project come together seamlessly.

meanings.definition: Able to stick fast to a surface or object.
meanings.sent1: The adhesive bandage stayed firmly on the wound.
meanings.sent2: The new glue is very adhesive and perfect for the job.
meanings.sent3: The superhero's cape was so adhesive, it never flew off during battles.
meanings.sent4: Her words were as adhesive as glue, leaving a lasting impact on everyone.
meanings.sent5: The adhesive properties of the material made it ideal for the experiment.
